title: ISic000284. I.Sicily inscription 000284
body:
Facsimile Images

a
1CURPAT͡ERP[.]OC
b
1GALLOE͡TBRADUACOSNU[---]

Apparatus criticus

Text of CIL

translation

commentary

Manganaro speculatively links this to imperial control of the Taormina quarries, but as Wilson notes, there is no reason to do so.

bibliography
